conbody.p: Since there is the possibility that the thesaurus entry appears in external projects, the ID tab provides the opportunity to enter the external ID, thus linking the projects.

ul.li: Provider: Choose the provider from the drop-down list.
Type: Enter the type of the ID.
External ID: Enter the external ID here (e.g. Trismegistos).
Add Identifier: Add another set of information, including the "Provider", "Type" and "External ID" in the case of multiple appearances of the used thesaurus entries in more than one project.
